verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Free from the law, O happy condition, Jesus hath bled, and there is remission; Cursed by the law and bruised by the fall, Grace hath redeemed us once for all.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Now we are free--there's no condemnation, Jesus provides a perfect salvation; "Come unto Me," O hear His sweet call, Come, and He saves us once for all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: "Children of God", O glorious calling, Surely His grace will keep us from falling; Passing from death to life at His call, Blessed salvation once for all.
